body.p: The WebHelp Classic variant is designed for desktop systems when feedback from users is not necessary and it is available for DocBook and DITA document types. The WebHelp Classic with Feedback variant also includes a feedback system that allows your users to make comments and allows you to manage and reply to them. This section contains information about configuring a WebHelp Classic system and customizing the output.

WebHelp Classic output can be produced by using built-in transformation scenarios from within Oxygen XML Editor/Author or by using the Oxygen XML WebHelp Plugin to process the transformations from a script outside of Oxygen XML Editor/Author.
